title: Cherry Cream Cheese Bake
directions: In a greased 8×8 baking dish, layer half of the crescent rolls.
Blend the cream cheese in a medium bowl until smooth. Blend in powdered sugar and vanilla.
Spread the cream cheese mixture over the crescent rolls evenly and top with cherry pie filling.
Top with the 4 triangles left of the crescent rolls. Melt the butter and pour it over the top. And sprinkle granulated sugar over the top.
In a preheated oven to 375° bake for 25 minutes and Voila!
